resources.string: Bring ROV to starting pose. Enable by pressing buttons \"First\" and \"Hold\" in order within 2 seconds of each other. \n\nContinue holding, on enable hold, position the ROV to its starting position and release \"Hold"\.
Torpedo will follow a fixed path through a known map
Localization is attempting to find pose.\n\nMove ROV closer to start position.

Move to starting position


The ROV must be within the following before releasing hold:

0.0075m in translation
10 degrees in rotation
